summary: This is just a data file for Caliente\'s BodySlide
descriptionHtml:
This is just a data file for Caliente\'s BodySlide for people who want to a bit more thigh on their cbbe model.

Install by extracting the files into your BodySlide directory.

Warning: this will overwrite Caliente\'s default in SliderSets.

No pics - The file is 15k and easy to install, so I\'m not going to the trouble.
I set the Adult only flag but the slider can be made to work for the never-nude version of cbbe by copy-pasting 3 lines in SliderSets/CalienteSets.xml

Just for anyone who doesn\'t know: BodySlide is a tool Caliente made to tweak cbbe meshes.  This file is not a mesh and is not directly usable in the game.

You may be aware that Caliente is releasing armors for use with BodySlide. Those armors will not have any accommodation for this slider, and adding the slider to them is probably a lot of work.
If I decide to do that work, I\'ll post something, but I doubt I\'ll even look at it before Caliente is done with her armor project. 
[color=red][size=5]
FAQ:
[/size][/color]
1. This only changes thighs.

2. [s]There is a known issue at 100% - namely that a vertex split occurs on the right thigh - I\'ll upload a \'redone\' version - It will look a little different because it\'s a full do-over.[/s]

3. Sliders will probably exceed the BodySlide\'s default window size. 
The bodyslide window is hardcoded GUI instead of using a layout manager, so just resize the window.

4. Want to add this slider to another body?
Open sliderSets/CalienteSets.xml with your favorite text editor (like gvim)
Copy the 3 line definition for the \'Thighs\' slider from the first SliderSet \"CalienteBody\"
Paste those 3 lines into the SliderSet of your choice ex: CalienteNeverNude, ... etc
Save the file, cross your fingers and restart bodyslide

5. You did #4, but now you have duplicated sliders. (you use a text editor that makes backups ?)
You have duplicates in your SliderSets folder.
Go to the SliderSets directory and delete or move or change the extension of any .xml files other than one you want BodySlide to use. 

Sorry
author: Macavity
